Why

a front end developer

We are dream makers and everything we create is what visitors see, feel and interact. It gets more challenging as time goes, but the level of satisfaction increases from improving my work. Sitting in front of computers could be boring and daunting but not at all when doing what I passionate about.

What

motivates me

It is changing really fast. Well, I don't mean the increasing numbers of the css frameworks or the javascript libraries, As I enjoy making use of CSS, FlexBox, CSS Grid according to the situation. When I say changing fast, I mean more of the ways, the techniques and the latest tools that keeps me learning and improving.

How

to do it

There isn't really any short cut to this. I find myself pretty much learning everyday, from my own work, other's code, Youtube Channel, blog, online schools etc... I enjoy to apply what I know and make it better. I also enjoy the process of learning what I don't know, as I would make it work and make it better.
